# shouldPlaySound

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether you must play a sound manually.

## Declaration

```swift
var shouldPlaySound: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is `true` only when both of the following conditions are true:

1. A person performs an AirPod stem click.
2. You disable the default capture sound.

If this property is `false`, calling [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVCaptureEvent/play(_:)] has no effect. Omitting the sound when expected can significantly impact the user experience.



## Playing a sound

- **play(_:)**: Plays the specified capture sound through AirPods.
